content.question: Which of the following best explains the “elephant in the room” as expressed in the passage?

choices.label: There is a lack of transparent political processes as far as the national question is concerned.
Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland have been granted assemblies, whereas England has none.
There is a likelihood that Scotland will have to leave the United Kingdom if these behaviors continue.
The English have an overwhelming majority in the House of Commons.

content.answer: Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland have been granted assemblies, whereas England has none.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the author's argument or perspective relates to political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
